display_long_description:
Hop on your **hoverbike** and go guns blazing in this story-driven single-player experience! **This is Retronika and it’s time to fight back.**

Fight through **chaotic traffic and vibrant cityscapes,** face off against towering metallic bosses, and drones, and prove who’s truly in charge in Retronika!


# Expect Chaotic Battles
Engage in high-speed battles, taking down drones and enemy vehicles as you progress.
[media]

# Master Your Hoverbike Skills
Take full control of your hoverbike while fighting through and **master your movement to survive!**
[media]

# Unravel the Mystery
Venture into Planet Retronika, a once-friendly world that has now turned **hostile**, and uncover its secrets.
[media]

# Challenge Yourself in Endless Mode
Put your skills to the rest in this challenging endless run with escalating difficulty - are you up for a challenge?
[media]

# Upgrade. Customize. Dominate.
Get the most out of your hoverbike with **powerful upgrades** and **personalize it** with different customizations!
[media]
